verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

And your altars <S%H4196><s%> shall become desolate <S%H8074><s%>, and your sun-images <S%H2553><s%> shall be broken <S%H7665><s%>; and I will cast down <S%H5307><s%> your slain <S%H2491><s%> men before <S%H6440><s%> your idols <S%H1544><s%>.
